stories.summary: As a Admin, I want to to be able to code a story, so I can Easily create stories using code
As a Admin, I want to to be able to create a new project, so I can I can start working on it
As a Admin, I want to Create Users, so I can create a new record
As a Admin, I want to List all Users, so I can easily navigate
As a Admin, I want to See a single User, so I can see more in depth information
As a Admin, I want to to be able to link others directly to User, so I can share links on other platforms
As a Admin, I want to update Users, so I can change information
As a Admin, I want to delete Users, so I can remove unwanted Users
As a Admin, I want to List all Authors, so I can easily navigate
As a Admin, I want to See a single Author, so I can see more in depth information
As a Admin, I want to to be able to link others directly to Author, so I can share links on other platforms
As a Business Owner, I want to to be able to view Authors that belong to me, so I can view all records
As a Business Owner, I want to See a single Author if I am the owner, so I can see more in depth information
As a Business Owner, I want to See a permission denied message for Author if I am not owner, so I can know I dont have access
As a Business Owner, I want to to be able to link others directly to Author, so I can share links on other platforms
As a Admin, I want to Create Tasks, so I can create a new record
As a Admin, I want to List all Tasks, so I can easily navigate
As a Admin, I want to See a single Task, so I can see more in depth information
As a Admin, I want to to be able to link others directly to Task, so I can share links on other platforms
As a Admin, I want to update Tasks, so I can change information
As a Admin, I want to delete Tasks, so I can remove unwanted Tasks
